page.title: 03A DAY IN MY LIFE PART 2
page.content: tightrope walker when I grow up. It will be very good practice for me. On rainy days I carry an umbrella to keep my balance and also to keep the rain off me. After church I go with my mum and sister to the sweet shop 150 yards away from us. I have a 10p mix bag and so does Laura, my little sister. Then we go home. I eat my mix bag at home but Laura eats hers on the way back to our house. When we get home I go upstairs to eat my mix bag while Laurs, who has already eaten hers, wails at mum for Superman on the television. When I have finished my mix bag, I go downstairs. I never walk downstairs. I slide down head first. I do it because its more fun than ordinary walking downstairs. Then I walk into the lounge and watch Superman which I must have seen about a billion times.
